thread.title: Man befriends chicken; makes new pet eat chicken
thread.title_full: Man befriends chicken; makes new pet eat chicken - NY Daily News

author: NEW YORK DAILY NEWS
title: Man befriends chicken; makes new pet eat chicken
text:
keezythefahnessa via Instagram/Instagram An Instagram user befriended a random chicken and encouraged it to engage in fried chicken cannibalism. Enlarge keezythefahnessa via Instagram/Instagram An Instagram user befriended a random chicken and made it pose for selfies and listen to rap music in his car. Enlarge Apparently, a dog is not a man's best friend â€” the bird is.
A man has opened his arms (and his car) to a fowl walking down the street, befriending the stray farm animal and taking him under his wing.
Instagram user @KeezyTheFahNessa uploaded several video clips to his account showcasing his budding new friendship with a bird he named "Cece."
